bugprone-command-processor.description:
Description

Flags calls to
system()
,
popen()
, and
_popen()
, which
execute a command processor. It does not flag calls to
system()
with a null
pointer argument, as such a call checks for the presence of a command processor
but does not actually attempt to execute a command.

References
This check corresponds to the CERT C Coding Standard rule
ENV33-C. Do not call system()
.
bugprone-command-processor.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
